name: XDEFI Wallet
highlight: One wallet for all your crypto. Store, send and receive all Avalanche assets, including NFTs with XDEFI Wallet.
summary: XDEFI Wallet is a multi-chain web3 browser extension wallet - currently supporting 13 different blockchains including Avalanche. XDEFI Wallet has a user base of more than 100,000 weekly active users, allowing them to connect to thousands of decentralised applications, securely store all their crypto assets, as well as manage their NFTs.
